CustomField.description: The stage in the transaction creation process the Expense Claim is in, updated by the application automatically. New - Expense Claim has not been approved Ready - Expense Claim Approved, ready to be processed Processed - Expense Claim has had Transactions created Failed - The process to create Transactions failed - check Debug Log
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The stage in the transaction creation process the Expense Claim is in New - Claim has not been approved Ready - Claim Approved, ready to be processed Processed - Claim has had Transactions created Failed - The process to create Transactions failed
CustomField.label: Transaction Creation Status
